parameters.name: autoSnapshotPolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic snapshot policy.

parameters.name: diskIds
parameters.description: The IDs of disks. The value is a JSON array that consists of disk IDs. Separate the disk IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: regionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the automatic snapshot policy and the disks. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
